law.text:
A qualifying redevelopment project shall incorporate environmentally responsible design elements that promote:
water conservation by using practices, techniques, and technologies that:
reduce the consumption, loss, or waste of water;
improve efficiency in the use of water; or
make more efficient use of the water treatment infrastructure;
energy efficiency by using practices, techniques, and technologies that reduce and minimize the consumption, loss, or waste of energy; and
the use of recycled or recyclable building materials.
